manuscript_citation:
Pharmacological characterization of crotamine effects on mice hind limb paralysis employing both ex vivo and in vivo assays: insights into the involvement of voltage-gated ion channels in the crotamine action on skeletal muscles

Sunamita de Carvalho Lima1, Lucas de Carvalho Porta1, Álvaro da Costa Lima1, Joana D’Arc Campeiro1, Ywlliane Meurer2, Nathália Bernardes Teixeira3, Thiago Duarte1, Gisele Picolo3, Rosely Oliveira Godinho1, Regina Helena Silva1, Mirian Akemi Furuie Hayashi1, *

1Departamento de Farmacologia, Escola Paulista de Medicina (EPM), Universidade Federal de São Paulo (UNIFESP), São Paulo, Brazil; 2Departamento de Fisiologia, Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte (UFRN), Natal, Brazil; 3Special Laboratory of Pain and Signaling, Instituto Butantan, São Paulo, Brazil.
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: All the animals should be divided in two groups each of control (normal saline, 10 ml/kg, i.p), and treated group with the substance to be tested.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: All the animals should be divided in two groups each of control (normal saline, 10 ml/kg, i.p), and treated group with the substance to be tested.

components.data: After 30 min of step 1 the animals should be treated intraperitonialy (i.p.) with crotamine  for induction of writhing. After 5 min of injection, the number of abdominal constrictions (writhes) should be counted for 30 min. The i.p. injection of anything caused writhing due puncturing of peritoneal membrane and these writhing due to injection terminated within in 5 min of post administration.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After 30 min of step 1 the animals should be treated intraperitonialy (i.p.) with crotamine  for induction of writhing. After 5 min of injection, the number of abdominal constrictions (writhes) should be counted for 30 min. The i.p. injection of anything caused writhing due puncturing of peritoneal membrane and these writhing due to injection terminated within in 5 min of post administration.
